63830.「どうされましたか？\n 落ち着いてください！: How can I help? Please stay calm!

63831.「む 息子が……。\n セリクが 息をしてないんです！: I..it's my son... Selik isn't breathing!

63832.「大変……！\n 先生を 呼んできますわ！！: Oh, no...! I'll get the doctor right away!!

63834.「……どうにか 一命は とりとめましたが \n もう一度 今のような症状が起こっ:
He somehow managed to survive... but if he
experiences the same symptoms again, please
prepare yourselves for it.

63835.「……先生！ 息子を助けてください！\n 本当に 治る見込みは ないのですか！？:
Doctor, please! Is there really no way you
can save our son...?!

63836.「この病気を治す薬が…… \n ないというわけでは ないのです……。:
Well... it's not that there isn't a cure for
it...

63838.「ただ その薬の材料となる宝石……\n アルゴンハートが\n もう この世に存在:
However, the gem from which the potion is
made, the Argon Heart... it no longer exists.

63839.「昔は ロヴォス高地のゼドラ洞にいる\n 赤き巨竜から 採れたのですが\n すで:
You used to be able to get them from Red
Dragons in the Zedra Cave... but they all
went extinct a long time ago...

63841.「この子が 何をしたっていうの……？\n 私が 代わってあげられたらいいのに……:
What can we do...? I wish I could just take
his place...

63842.「おチカラになれず 申し訳ありません……。: I'm sorry that I can't help you...

63843.「……まだ いらしたんですか？\n すみませんが 今は\n ご家族の方だけに さ:
Oh, are you still here...? I'm sorry, but
you'll have to leave him alone with his
family.

63849.「セリク！ 私だ 聞こえるか？: Selik! It's me. Can you hear me?

63851.「意識が 戻らない……？\n 薬の調合は 完璧だったはずなのに\n いったい ど:
He can't wake up...? I thought I'd mixed
the medicine perfectly, so why...?

63852.「……目が覚めないのは 気になりますが\n 身体の石化が治っただけでも 充分です:
That does worry me, but... the fact that the
petrification has been cured is good enough.
My son must surely be grateful, too.

63853.「これほど 親身になってくれた お医者様は \n ユーグ先生が はじめてです。\:
You've been the first doctor who's ever been
this kind to us. We will never forget what
you've done for us.

63854.「ファンの方も ありがとうございます。\n あなたが持ってきた アルゴンハートの:
And we need to thank you, too. Thanks to that
Argon Heart, my son's body is completely back
to normal.

63855.「今すぐには お礼になりそうな物を\n ご用意できないのですが……\n 必ず こ:
I can't offer you anything that could possibly
repay you right now... but I promise I will
repay you somehow.

63857.「患者さんの病気が 治ったのは\n ひとえに あなたのおかげです。\n 本当に:
Thanks to you, his illness has been cured.
We truly cannot thank you enough.

63858.「しかし 彼はまだ 意識不明の状態……。\n すみませんが 目を覚ますまで ここ:
But, he is still unconcious... Excuse me, but
would you please let him be alone with his
family for the time being?

63861.「まさか リゼロッタと <pc>さんが\n 僕を 生き返らせようとしてたなんてね:
I had no idea that you two were trying to
bring me back from the dead... but I want to
stay here. No matter what.

63862.「あなた 自分の意志で戻らないつもり！？\n どうして……？:
You have no intention of going back?!
But why...?

63863.「せっかく <pc>さんが\n 生き返れるように してくれたのよ。\n ご両親も:
<pc> here went through a lot of
trouble to revive you. Your parents are so
worried, and are waiting for you...

63865.「僕の病気が 治ったって\n 以前のように トゥーラを弾けるようになるかは\n:
I have no idea if I'll be able to play the
Torban the same ever again, even with my
disease cured.

63866.「そんなの 嫌だ！\n 僕は ずっと この世界で\n 自由に トゥーラを弾いてい:
I don't want to take that chance! I want to be
free to play the Torban in this world...
Forever!

63868.「……リズ。\n セリクが飛び出していくのと すれちがったけど\n 後を 追いか:
Liz... Selik just ran past me. Shouldn't we
go after him?

63869.「ほっといてくれって 言われたのよ……。\n これ以上 おせっかいを焼くべきじゃ:
He told us to leave him alone... and that we
shouldn't bother.

63870.「大切なことは 伝えるべき時に 伝えないと\n あとで 後悔することになる……。:
If you don't tell people what's important
now, you'll regret it later... you know
that very well, don't you?

63871.「……何があったのか 知らないけど\n 悔いのないように ちゃんと納得いくまで\:
I don't know what happened, but you should
tell him your true feelings... that way,
you'll have nothing to regret.

63873.「<pc>さん すみませんが\n 一緒に セリクを探していただけませんか？:
Sorry to ask, but can you help me search for
Selik?

63874.「きっと まだ 町のどこかにいると思うんです。\n 私も 心当たりを探してみます:
I'm sure he's still around town somewhere.
I'll see what I can find.

63875.「訓練して 治る見込みがあるなら\n がんばってみなさいよ！\n 向こうの世界に:
If there's a chance to practice and get
better, then just do it! You have to go
back!

63876.「他人事だと思って カンタンに言うな！\n キミに 病気で ずっと苦しんできた\:
Don't talk to me like it's your problem! You
have no idea what it's been like being sick
and having to suffer your whole life!

63877.「……だいたい 訓練なんかしたところで\n もし 元に戻らなかったら\n どう責:
Even if I keep practicing, if I can't play
how I used to... then what's the point?!

63878.「……あなた 私と代わりなさい！\n 私 また生き返ることができるなら\n どん:
Then I'll take your place! I don't care how
much pain I have to go through, so long as
I can come back to life!

63879.「永遠に大人になれない 私たちより\n ずっと恵まれているのに 甘えてばかりの\:
I can't even begin to understand how
privileged you are... you have it so much
better! We can never grow up!

63881.「……あなたの演奏 ステキだったもの。\n 向こうの世界で トゥーラを弾けるよう:
I loved your performance... you should learn
to play in the other world, so that more
people can hear how great you are.

63883.「……僕は とんだ甘ったれだったね。\n キミの言う通り また 向こうの世界で\:
I have been acting spoiled, haven't I...
Okay. I'll do my best to play again in the
other world, just like you said.

63886.「もう会えないのは つらいですけれど\n こうするのが セリクにとって\n いち:
It's hard to see him go, but I know this is
what's best for him...

63887.「彼の命を 救ってくださって\n 本当に ありがとうございました。\n さあ こ:
It's thanks to you that his life was saved.
Please, take this.

63888.「おお よく来てくれました ファンの方！\n セリクが 目を覚ましたんですよ！: Oh, it's you! Selik is awake!

63889.「ここまで 息子が回復できたのも\n すべて あなたのおかげです。\n さあ ぜ:
It is all thanks to you that my son has been
able to recover this much. Please, come
and see him.

63891.「こんにちは <pc>さん。\n 会いに来てくれると 思っていたよ。:
Hello, <pc>. I was hoping you would
come to see me.

63892.「ここで 長い眠りから 目覚めた時は\n あの 不思議な世界の出来事は\n 何も:
When I finally woke up after that long sleep,
I thought that everything that happened in
that strange world was a dream, but...

63893.「やっぱり 本当のことだったんだね。: I knew it was all true.

63894.「手を動かす訓練で くじけそうになった時\n これを見ると リゼロッタの言葉を思:
When I feel down by practicing moving my
hands again, this will remind me of
Lieselotte's words and motivate me.

63895.「ありがとう <pc>さん。\n あなたに 命を救ってもらったおかげで\n また:
Thank you, <pc>. You saved my
life so that I could have the chance to
pursue my dream again.

63896.「……いつか トゥーラが弾けるようになったら\n 僕の演奏 聴きにきてほしいな。:
One day, when I learn to play the Torban
again, I hope you'll come listen. I'll save
the best seat just for you!

70773.「いつか グランゼドーラの音楽祭で優勝するのが\n あなたの夢なんでしょう……？:
You said your dream was to win that music
festival, right...? Please, I'm begging you...
Make that dream come true for us, too.

70774.「その前に 一曲だけ 弾きたいな。\n 最後に 聴いていってくれるかい？:
But before I do... I'd like to play one last
song. Would you mind listening?

70775.「向こうの世界の セリクの活躍を\n 見ることができないのは 心残りですが\n:
I'll miss being able to see him play in the
other world... but I know for sure he'll
fulfill his dream.

99643.「後ほど 旅のコンシェルジュに\n 贈り物を 届けておきますので\n どうか 受:
I will have your gift delivered to the Travel
Concierge. Please accept it.

99644.「これから ずっと つらい訓練を続けても\n トゥーラを 弾けるようになる日なん:
Even if I continue practicing super hard, the
day when I can play Torban again might never
come...
